policies.inbound:
<set-variable name="requestBody" value="@(context.Request.Body.As())" />
        
        <set-variable name="salary" value="@{
            try {
                var body = ((string)context.Variables["requestBody"]);
                var json = Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject.Parse(body);
                return json["Salary"]?.Value() ?? 75000;
            }
            catch {
                return 75000;
            }
        }" />
